sqlMap.select: select CUI_ID, SCC_ID, CUI_PHONE, CUI_EMAIL, CUI_RESUME_ID, CUI_CREATEUSER, CUI_CREATETIME, CUI_MODIFYUSER, CUI_MODIFYTIME, CUI_EXT1, CUI_EXT2, CUI_EXT3 from B_CHECK_USER_INFO where CUI_ID = #cuiId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select CUI_ID, SCC_ID, CUI_PHONE, CUI_EMAIL, CUI_RESUME_ID, CUI_CREATEUSER, CUI_CREATETIME, CUI_MODIFYUSER, CUI_MODIFYTIME, CUI_EXT1, CUI_EXT2, CUI_EXT3 from B_CHECK_USER_INFO ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select CUI_ID, SCC_ID, CUI_PHONE, CUI_EMAIL, CUI_RESUME_ID, CUI_CREATEUSER, CUI_CREATETIME, CUI_MODIFYUSER, CUI_MODIFYTIME, CUI_EXT1, CUI_EXT2, CUI_EXT3 from B_CHECK_USER_INFO )
sqlMap.insert: insert into B_CHECK_USER_INFO (CUI_ID, SCC_ID, CUI_PHONE, CUI_EMAIL, CUI_RESUME_ID, CUI_CREATEUSER, CUI_CREATETIME, CUI_MODIFYUSER, CUI_MODIFYTIME, CUI_EXT1, CUI_EXT2, CUI_EXT3) values (SEQ_B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE.NEXTVAL, #sccId#, #cuiPhone#, #cuiEmail#, #cuiResumeId#, #cuiCreateuser#, #cuiCreatetime#, #cuiModifyuser#, #cuiModifytime#, #cuiExt1#, #cuiExt2#, #cuiExt3#)
sqlMap.update: update B_CHECK_USER_INFO set SCC_ID = #sccId#, CUI_PHONE = #cuiPhone#, CUI_EMAIL = #cuiEmail#, CUI_RESUME_ID = #cuiResumeId#, CUI_CREATEUSER = #cuiCreateuser#, CUI_CREATETIME = #cuiCreatetime#, CUI_MODIFYUSER = #cuiModifyuser#, CUI_MODIFYTIME = #cuiModifytime#, CUI_EXT1 = #cuiExt1#, CUI_EXT2 = #cuiExt2#, CUI_EXT3 = #cuiExt3# where CUI_ID = #cuiId#
